QuestData.Title: All Spirits Great and Small
QuestData.Description:
The time has come for us to rekindle another animal spirit.
While appearing normal to you, and to the great winged creature that ate it, this creature was in fact somewhat special among its kind.
You should travel to its grisly resting place and commune with its spirit so that it may join us in the conservatory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Tiragarde Sound in search of the remains

Objectives.Objective: Commune with the remains in Tiragarde Sound
